rules.description: Holding Keys: ⌘V for Clipboard History, ⇧⌘3 for Screenshot Palette, ⇧⌘4 for Snagit

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Clipboard History"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "-Screenshot Palette"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "-Snagit Palette"'
